# NSTokenField.TokenStyle

**Enumeration**

The NSTokenStyle constants define how tokens are displayed and editable in the `NSTokenFieldCell`. These values are used by [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTokenFieldCell/tokenStyle] and the delegate method [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTokenFieldCellDelegate/tokenFieldCell(_:styleForRepresentedObject:)].

## Declaration

```swift
enum TokenStyle
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **NSTokenField.TokenStyle.default**
- **NSTokenField.TokenStyle.none**
- **NSTokenField.TokenStyle.plainSquared**
- **NSTokenField.TokenStyle.rounded**
- **NSTokenField.TokenStyle.squared**

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
title: NSTokenField.TokenStyle
